Properties

QList< ConfigurationFile * > configurations

Detailed Description

Definition of a meta configuration file defined in file configurationdef.xml. The meta file defined one or more configuration file. This file define dictionary too.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Test if the meta configuration file exists in the path DirectoryPath and return true if the file exist

ConfigurationFile MetaConfigurationFile::simpleConfigurationFile ( const QString &  directoryPath  )  [static]

Return the version of one of the configuration file (only if the file exists and the version can be found). This method parse configurations file to find the version number. If a version is founded, this not parse the next files.

Parameters:
DirectoryPath path of the meta configuration file.
